extracted_playbook.title: Install June 2022 Cumulative Windows Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest updates provided with the June 2022 cumulative Windows Updates to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Protected View
extracted_playbook.description: Enable 'Protected View' in Microsoft Office applications to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Preview Mode
extracted_playbook.description: Disable 'Preview Mode' in Microsoft Office applications to prevent potential exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Suspicious Behavior in Microsoft Office
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor for suspicious behaviors in Microsoft Office products. Ensure that 'msdt.exe' is not spawned by Office products like 'words.exe', 'outlook.exe', and 'excel.exe'.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove ms-msdt Handler from Registry
extracted_playbook.description: Remove the 'ms-msdt' handler from the Windows Registry as a temporary workaround.

extracted_playbook.title: Delete search-ms Protocol Handler from Registry
extracted_playbook.description: Delete the 'search-ms' protocol handler from the Windows Registry as a temporary workaround.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Attack Surface Reduction Features
extracted_playbook.description: Use Attack Surface Reduction features to prevent Office applications from spawning child processes. Be aware that this may block some legitimate applications.

affected_products: All Windows versions still receiving Security Updates
